headline: The World Awaits: AI Infrastructure, Energy Convergence Drives Investment
summary: AI infrastructure and energy are converging themes driving massive capex from hyperscalers and related beneficiaries. Read what investors need to know about these developments.

headline: Levelpath Expands Integration Ecosystem With Ironclad and Robust API Capabilities
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, August 27, 2025--Levelpath, the delightful AI-native procurement platform, expands its integration network by adding Ironclad, the AI contract management platform.

headline: Salesforce Stock Has Had a Terrible 2025. It Might Be Too Cheap to Pass Up.
summary: The software company has fallen 25% this year, but its earnings, due Sept. 3, could be the start of a revival.

headline: SCREENVISION MEDIA LAUNCHES MODERN CLOUD-BASED CINEMA ADVERTISING PLATFORM
summary: Screenvision Media, a national leader in delivering comprehensive premium video advertising and content representation services for top-tier cinema exhibitors, today announced the company has successfully modernized its core business systems by migrating to Microsoft Azure and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI).

raw.headline: SCREENVISION MEDIA LAUNCHES MODERN CLOUD-BASED CINEMA ADVERTISING PLATFORM
raw.summary: Screenvision Media, a national leader in delivering comprehensive premium video advertising and content representation services for top-tier cinema exhibitors, today announced the company has successfully modernized its core business systems by migrating to Microsoft Azure and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI).

headline: Exiger Wins AI Company of the Year in STEVIE® Awards for Technology Excellence
summary: Exiger, the market-leading supply chain AI company and largest provider of supply chain technology to the U.S. Federal Government, has been named a winner of the Silver® Award for Artificial Intelligence Company of the Year in the second annual Stevie Awards for Technology Excellence. Exiger was recognized alongside fellow enterprise software and advanced technology leaders, including Amazon / Amazon Web Services, Google, IBM, Meta, Microsoft, Nvidia, Oracle, Salesforce, and ServiceNow.

headline: Beat or Miss, Stick With Nvidia Stock
summary: How should investors assess the report? Nvidia shareholders have been best served by taking a long-term view on the stock and not selling in response to volatility. Unless there is a dramatic change in Nvidia's long-term fundamental outlook, they should hold steady.

raw.headline: Beat or Miss, Stick With Nvidia Stock
raw.summary: How should investors assess the report? Nvidia shareholders have been best served by taking a long-term view on the stock and not selling in response to volatility. Unless there is a dramatic change in Nvidia's long-term fundamental outlook, they should hold steady.

headline: Oracle Enhances Electronic Data Capture Solution to Streamline Clinical Trials and Help Bring New Therapies to Market Faster
summary: Oracle today introduced significant advancements to its Electronic Data Capture (EDC) solution, Oracle Clinical One Data Collection. These new capabilities enable seamless interoperability with Electronic Health Record (EHR) systems, enhance data collection capabilities at trial sites, and provide end-to-end integration with Oracle Safety One Argus and other safety solutions. headline: Robo.ai Inc. Appoints Seasoned Global Executive as Chief Legal and Compliance Officer
summary: Robo.ai Inc. (Nasdaq: AIIO), a Dubai - headquartered global smart technology company, today announces the appointment of Mr. Xuan Yan as its Chief Legal and Compliance Officer, Corporate Secretary, and President of Americas, reporting directly to Robo.ai's global CEO. This appointment further enhances the company's global leadership capabilities as Robo.ai reenergizes and accelerates its strategic transformation and growth.

This appointment further enhances the company's global leadership capabilities as Robo.ai reenergizes and accelerates its strategic transformation and growth.

headline: How Oracle’s Massive Data Center Expansion Shapes Its 2025 Stock Valuation
summary: Thinking about what to do with Oracle stock? You are not alone. Lately, Oracle has been doing what it does best: keeping investors guessing with its blend of solid long-term results and an always-changing risk profile. Just look at the numbers. In the last five years, Oracle’s total return has soared by 336.5%, including a remarkable 229% surge over the past three years. Even the one-year track record, up 70.9%, would make any investor do a double take. But the last month tells a different...

headline: Nvidia Has the Power to Move Markets. Watch These Sectors.
summary: It’s rare that a single company has the potential to move markets but Nvidia's earnings report has that power and will be key for multiple sectors.  The artificial-intelligence trade is the driver behind not just chip companies but also utilities, energy, cloud-computing and software stocks.  “Nvidia is the ultimate bellwether for the AI story and investors look to this company every quarter for reassurance that the AI story is still intact,” said Clark Bellin, president of wealth manager Bellwether Wealth.

raw.headline: Nvidia Has the Power to Move Markets. Watch These Sectors.
raw.summary: It’s rare that a single company has the potential to move markets but Nvidia's earnings report has that power and will be key for multiple sectors.  The artificial-intelligence trade is the driver behind not just chip companies but also utilities, energy, cloud-computing and software stocks.  “Nvidia is the ultimate bellwether for the AI story and investors look to this company every quarter for reassurance that the AI story is still intact,” said Clark Bellin, president of wealth manager Bellwether Wealth.
